name: Plustest01
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Now you can use Alexa to control all your devices connected to your IGLU! You can order Alexa to operate blinds, curtains, lights and any of your other connected devices. You must have an IGLU and a valid login
Plus test 01 skill for Amazon Alexa
